Question: During 1976–77, this person played on and co-produced John Phillips's solo recording Pay Pack & Follow (released in 2001).
Hints: This person met Jagger on a train as Jagger was headed to classes at the London School of Economics.
In August 2007 this person signed a publishing deal for his autobiography, Life, which was released 26 October 2010.
In August 2006 this person was granted a pardon by Arkansas governor Mike Huckabee for a 1975 reckless driving citation.
